content: snips snails and puppy dog tails is it possible for a tape measurer to be any cuter than this i don t think so and he s sure to brighten up any sewing crocheting quilting or knitting project you currently need to measure this puppy s right ear hides the tail of the tape measurer just press the center of his back and voila the tape measurer curls back inside all you need to make this pattern is a round tape measurer about 2 1/4 inches in diameter - or across and tiny amounts of scrap yarn i used acrylic worsted weight yarn and a g hook i used very small amounts of yarn to make these so it s a great stashbuster a quick easy project for those who need instant gratification
